details.title: fix: improve mobile UX on PWA
details.body:
## Changes

- made background color in the web manifest match the gray on the login page nav bar
- disabled user scaling
- added padding to SZ logos

## Review

@talhakhalid 
- [ ] No concerns

### Testing

If this section is empty, no manual testing is needed.

## To Do

The reviewers can add items here as changes are requested.
